explanation: [0-0] A man and a woman stand side by side behind a table. The man has long hair, wears a green jacket and red pants. The woman wears a black top and black and white grid pants, and sunglasses. Both of them extend their right hands, palms open, covering their eyes. Each person has a long, colorful candy in their mouth.

[0-4] The woman lowers her hand, opens her eyes and looks at the man, then she takes a pair of scissors in her left hand and cuts the candy in the man's mouth. Then the man eats the candy in his mouth, shows a happy expression, clenches his hands into fists and waves them at his chest.

[4-11] Then the scene switches, the man and the woman are sitting at the table, also covering their eyes with their right hands, each with a straw in their mouths. The straw is inserted into a transparent cup containing a small amount of milk. The woman puts down her right hand, looks at the man, then puts her straw into the man's cup and sucks the milk with the man, then puts the straw back into her own cup and covers her eyes with her right hand. The man finds that the milk in his cup has been drunk, smiles at the camera and waves his clenched hands.

[11-21] The scene switches again, the man and the woman sit together in front of the table, the woman puts her hands around her chest on the table, the man covers his eyes with his right hand. There is a stack of banknotes on the left side of the table and a lollipop on the right. The man pointed to the banknotes with his index finger, and the woman quickly switched the positions of the banknotes and the lollipop. The man put down his right hand and showed a sad expression. The woman reached out her right hand and took the banknotes from the table. The camera cuts to a close-up of the woman's face, who is holding the banknotes, pouting at the camera and then raising her eyebrows with a smug smile.
